thread.title: The truth about Nathan's death exposed at his Hollyoaks funeral? | Metro News
thread.title_full: The truth about Nathan's death exposed at his Hollyoaks funeral? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: The truth about Nathan's death exposed at his Hollyoaks funeral? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 21 Feb 2017 12:01 am (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
The truth about the tragic death of Nathan Nightingale may be about to be exposed in dramatic Hollyoaks scenes as his funeral seems likely to descend into chaos. Mac and his lover, Nathan’s fiancee Lisa Loveday, were on the scene when Nathan fell to his death and so far, have managed to keep the truth under wraps. 
But as emotions run high and grief takes its toll, what discoveries are about to be made by the shattered family? 
It’s a heavy day for all involved, with Marnie an absolute wreck over her loss and Mac consumed both by his feelings of loss and guilt. Marnie’s mum Tabby returns to support her daughter but as the day of the ceremony arrives, Marnie is unable to hold it together. (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
Mac watches on, feeling terrible, as Marnie breaks down by her son’s coffin and as those who loved Nathan say their goodbyes, a dramatic turn of events may be about to reveal the circumstances around his death. (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
David Easter, who played Mac, recently hinted that the funeral would be a dramatic affair when he spoke to Metro.co.uk and suggested that his character’s dark path was only just beginning. If the truth about what he did were to come out, Mac would likely be exiled from the clan. (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
It remains to be seen exactly what plays out but a grief stricken Marnie is about to take drastic action that could have far reaching consequences… 
One to watch: Friday 24th February at 7pm on E4. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
